thread.title: Guilty pooch destroys cushion strewing feathers everywhere
thread.title_full: Guilty pooch destroys cushion strewing feathers everywhere

title: Guilty pooch destroys cushion strewing feathers everywhere
text: Share this article Share Sophie started filming as she followed the trail, unable to believe how far it was going. It took her two hours just to clear up the initial mess, and five days later, she's still finding feathers She then walked into her living room and found a very sheepish looking Yogi, who is one, sitting on the chair, aware he had done something wrong The bartender shared the video on Facebook with the comment: 'So my dog got hold of a feather cushion today #texaschickenmassacre.' She explained that the cushion, the size of a sofa seat, had been left in her room after she took the cover off to wash it, and she didn't realise she hadn't shut the door properly. She said: 'Yogi has gone in and got it, and well, you can see what happened 'It's not the first time, usually it's just a bit of paper or some cardboard, although last week he managed to get one of my childhood teddies. 'The poor bear had survived 20 years, with four cats, two dogs. It's now sat in a bag waiting to be taken to a toy maker to be repaired!' The bartender guessed that there could be as many as 10,000 feathers covering her house and it took two hours to pick up the main heaps by hand so as not to block the hoover. She said: 'We are still finding them now.' Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
